**Hello LET’s!**

I’d love to offer you a great deal on [StatusCake Website Monitoring](https://www.statuscake.com). We’ve been going now for nearly a year and have the likes of Google, Zynga and the UK Government using our services and in our last customer survey over 95% of our customers were happy with our service. 

We consider ourselves a reactive company and we’ve build a product that we’re proud of and that our users have had a huge amount of impact in shaping. You can add Ping tests, HTTP tests and TCP tests.

Today also marks the first day of our Full Site Scan beta. This beta enables you to find all broken links / images and external links from your site – thus ensuring your user experience is as best as it can be. 

We’re fully integrated into the likes of Geckoboard, Pagerduty, Zapier, Pushover, Boxcar and more – so you can get alerts the way you want. Our paid plans start from £3.49 but with the coupon: **BUBASU-LOW-END** you can get 30% off for life – and if you just want to try us out we have a **feature rich free plan also**!

Thanks guys ~
Daniel!
